page.title: 03FRATING CHURCH
page.content: THE CHURCH WAS ORIGINALLY BUILT IN 1125 AND THE PORCH WAS ADDED IN 1340. THE TOWER BELONGING TO THE CHURCH WAS DEMOLISHED IN 1969 AS IT HAD BECOME UNSAFE OVER THE YEARS.HOWEVER,SOME SAY THAT THE COLCHESTER EARTHQUAKE OF 1884 CAUSED SOME OF THE DAMAGE TO THE TOWER.IT TOOK TWO MEN TWO WEEKS TO DESTROY THE BASE OF THE TOWER WHICH HAD WALLS 6 FOOT THICK. THE OWNER OF THE CHURCH,AN INDUSTRIAL DESIGNER WHO HAS CONVERTED THE CHURCH INTO A PRIVATE HOUSE HAS A WORKSHOP AND STUDIO.THE WORKSHOP IS IN THE CHANCEL AREA AND THE STUDIO IN THE ROOF OF THE CHURCH WHICH IS NOW A LOFT. THE "GARDEN" AREA AROUND THE CHURCH IS STILL A GRAVEYARD! THE GRAVESTONES HAVE TO REMAIN THERE, BY LAW FOR 50 YEARS.
